sentences.sentence: Mr. Dinkins visited the bereaved family to offer comfort.
sentences.translation: 丁金斯先生拜访了丧失亲人的家庭，给予安慰。

sentences.sentence: The ceremony was an ordeal for those who had been recently bereaved.
sentences.translation: 这个仪式对于那些新近丧失亲友的人来说是一种折磨。

sentences.sentence: It was all carried out without any consideration for the susceptibilities of the bereaved family.
sentences.translation: 这样做全然没有考虑到死者家人的感受。
